snippet: Mitt Romney’s suggestion that he draws inspiration from the country’s founders while President Obama seeks a “European-style welfare state,” among other things, carries risks from Democrats and Republicans.
abstract: Political Memo; Mitt Romney’s suggestion that he draws inspiration from the country’s founders while President Obama seeks a 'European-style welfare state,' among other things, could be a risky comparison.
lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney’s suggestion that he draws inspiration from the country’s founders while President Obama seeks a “European-style welfare state,” among other things, carries risks from Democrats and Republicans.

headline.main: Romney Facing Risks Left and Right
headline.print_headline: Romney Facing Risks Left and Right
